title: Blended Remote Education Quality Management Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and remote teaching experience
context.additional_context: Social sector job competency enhancement program for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Three or more educational quality evaluation metrics can be established in blended synchronous/asynchronous environments.
Strategies to enhance learner engagement can be developed using VR/AR-based interaction tools.
Optimization plans for human-computer interaction (HCI) can be proposed through collaboration with platform developers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
